lines.text: So, what's your name, high roller?
, but you can call me CHIEF!
My name is Hugh Holmes and I like to think of Delano as my town.
Now listen, Boy, I don't care how long you was a MP. You doin' business in my county now, and I just might go outta my way to show you what that means.
You better be able to chew what ya bite off in my county, Boy, or I'll damn well see ya choke on it!
To beat the boll weevil you got to be both good and rich
I was an unshakable admirer of FDR's... Completely convinced he was ruining the country.
Just pretend you're back in the service, and I'm your commanding officer. And if that doesn't work, just pretend I'm... GOD!
If this thing is as big as I think it is, they won't need an election... they'll carry Billy to the governor's mansion on their shoulders!

[Addressing his men for the first time]
I see from your records that most of you have prior military experience... That's good since none of you know the first damn thing about police procedure!

[to Foxy]
I wouldn't be surprised if you didn't just win me the Nobel Prize!

[Billy is moving, and must leave his horse behind]
Don't worry, Billy... I'll take good care of Dapple, and that's a promise from me to you.
Give him a carrot every day... He like carrots.
I will... even if I have to steal one.
